mapper.select: SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , B.NA_BZPLCNO , A.USRID , A.USRNM , A.PW , A.ENO , A.MPNO , A.STRG_DT , A.PWERR_NT , A.FSRG_DTM , A.FSRGMN_ENO , A.LSCHG_DTM , A.LS_CMENO , NVL(C.NA_BZPLNM,'없음') NA_BZPLNM , NVL(D.GRP_C,'000') GRP_C FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_USR A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_BM_BZLOC B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_WMC C ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_GRP_USR D ON ( A.USRID = D.USRID ) WHERE A.USRID = #{usrid}

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , B.NA_BZPLCNO , A.USRID , A.USRNM , A.PW , A.ENO , A.MPNO , A.STRG_DT , A.PWERR_NT , A.FSRG_DTM , A.FSRGMN_ENO , A.LSCHG_DTM , A.LS_CMENO , NVL(C.NA_BZPLNM,'없음') NA_BZPLNM , NVL(D.GRP_C,'000') GRP_C FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_USR A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_BM_BZLOC B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_WMC C ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_GRP_USR D ON ( A.USRID = D.USRID ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND A.USRID = #{usrid}

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , B.NA_BZPLCNO , A.USRID , A.USRNM , A.PW , A.ENO , A.MPNO , A.STRG_DT , A.PWERR_NT , A.FSRG_DTM , A.FSRGMN_ENO , A.LSCHG_DTM , A.LS_CMENO , NVL(C.NA_BZPLNM,'없음') NA_BZPLNM , NVL(D.GRP_C,'000') GRP_C FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_USR A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_BM_BZLOC B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_WMC C ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_GRP_USR D ON ( A.USRID = D.USRID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.USRID = #{usrid} AND A.PW = Damo.ENC_B64('KEY1', #{pw})
